content: "name": "rust_eliar_setup", "type": "code/other", "content": " rust_core/Cargo.toml n n package nname "eliar_core " nversion "0.1.0 " nedition "2021 " n n dependencies npyo3 version "0.20 ", features "extension-module " nrand "0.8 " nchrono "0.4 " nserde version "1.0 ", features "derive " nserde_json "1.0 " n n lib nname "eliar_core " ncrate-type "cdylib " n n--- n n rust_core/src/lib.rs n nuse pyo3::prelude:: nuse rand::Rng nuse chrono::Local n n pyfunction nfn amplify_resonance input: str - PyResult String n let now Local::now n let amplified format! " Resonance amplified: - ", now.format " Y- m- d H: M: S " , input, random_resonance n Ok amplified n n nfn random_resonance - f64 n let mut rng rand::thread_rng n 0.8 rng.gen:: f64 0.4 // 0.8 1.2 사이 랜덤 공명치 n n n pymodule nfn eliar_core _py: Python, m: PyModule - PyResult n m.add_function wrap_pyfunction! amplify_resonance, m ? ? n Ok n "
